data.text: When people are angry with you, reply to them gently, and it will calm them;
When wise people speak [MTY], it causes those who hear what they say to want to know more;
Yahweh sees [MTY] what is happening everywhere;
Those who speak [MTY] kindly to people are like [MET] trees whose fruit gives life;
Foolish children despise their parents when their parents correct/discipline them;
There are many valuable things in the houses of righteous people;
What wise people teach [MTY] causes others to know much more,
Yahweh detests the sacrifices that are offered by wicked people;
Yahweh hates/detests the behavior of wicked people,
Those who do what is wrong will be severely punished;
Yahweh knows what is happening in the place where dead people [DOU] are,
Some people do not want to be corrected;
When people are happy, they have smiles on their faces;
Those who have good sense want to learn more;
Those who are oppressed constantly have difficulties,
Being poor and revering Yahweh
Eating meals with people whom you love and having only vegetables to eat
Those who quickly become angry cause arguments/quarreling,
Lazy people constantly have difficulties [MET]; it is as though they are walking through thorns;
Children who are wise cause their parents to be happy;
Foolish people are happy to continually act foolishly;
If there is no one to give us good advice, we will not accomplish what we are planning to do;
People rejoice when they are able to reply well to what others have asked them;
Wise people walk on a road that leads up to a long life;
Yahweh tears down the houses of proud people,
Yahweh detests what wicked people are thinking about doing;
Those who try hard to get money by acting dishonestly cause trouble for their family;
Righteous/Good people think carefully before they answer what others ask them;
Yahweh does not listen [MTY] to what wicked people request him to do;
If people have a smile on their faces, it makes them/others happy,
If people pay attention when people correct/warn them,
If people refuse to listen when others try to correct them, they are despising/hurting themselves;
If you revere Yahweh, you will learn how to become wise,
